TEexpress 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Compute differential expression analysis for transposable elements

    TE_DEA.Rd

    Compute differential expression analysis for transposable elements

    TE_DEA(
  metafile,
  folder,
  output = ".",
  maxpadj = 0.05,
  minlfc = 1,
  device = "png",
  plot.title = "",
  useCtrlGenes = FALSE,
  shrinklog2FC = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    metafile

    Full path of metadata file

    folder

    Full path for folder of count files

    output

    Path for output folder (default = ".")

    maxpadj

    P-adjusted value for significant features (default = 0.05)

    minlfc

    Value for dysregulated features (default = 1.0)

    device

    Format for graphs ("pdf", "svg", "eps", "png", "tiff", "jpeg"). A vector for several formats can be uses: c("svg", "png") (Default: "png)

    plot.title

    Text for graph titles (default: "")

    useCtrlGenes

    Boolean for using only genes in estimating DESeq2 size factors (default: FALSE)

    shrinklog2FC

    Boolean for applying log2FC shrinking in DESEq2 (default: FALSE)

    Value

    Table of results

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
TE_DEA(metafile, folder, output, maxpadj, minlfc, device, plot.title)
} # }
